name: Space Noodles - EN version (qwerty)
description:
Space Noodles is the encounter between a cooking game and a rythm game in the fabulous setting of space ! Will you become an expert chef ?

The base of this game was made in 2018 within few days with the help of Ced. But it took me a year to eventually finish the project. 

This is the english version of the game. You may experience mispelled and strange english combine with bugs. Feel free to give feedbacks, report bugs and misspellings

Controls :

*esc : activate menu

*left clic to interract

*Q W S A to stir the broth

*H Y to use noodles' pan

* P to cut herbs

french version here :  https://haneton.itch.io/space-noodles
